HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"If anything, persistent #blackpathology, in this, the current year, demonstrates that a 400 year science experiment has failed."
"I genuinely feel bad about saying this, but going by my mentions today, much of "black twitter" seems really stupid."
"Blacks naturally want more gibsmedats for dem programs because Whites have patronized them for 400 years. They have never had agency."
"How about we blame both and realise that rich people are fucking greedy, uncaring assholes most of the time."
"#BlackCrime and #blackdysfunction are proof that 400 years in proximity to Western civilization can't change genetics or historical trends."
"Kylie just said if I gain the freshman 15 she can't be my friend anymore. Quote on quote \"no fatties in my circle only baddies\""
"#blackpathology is the result of blacks enjoying the benefits of a society/civilization they did nothing to build."
"#PanamaPapers reveal what many Arabs suspected: corrupt tyrants embezzling $Billions -- will further destabilize such illegitimate regimes."
"Most old farts who play golf are obnoxious cunts."
"When the black and Paki youth think this country is THEIRS and what's WORSE the wealth too.......sthg has gone wrong people don't you agree?"
